verses.verse: God, <WH430> the nations <WH1471> have come <WH935> into your inheritance. <WH5159> They have defiled <WH2930> your holy <WH6944> temple. <WH1964> They have laid <WH7760> Jerusalem <WH3389> in heaps. <WH5856>

They have given <WH5414> the dead bodies <WH5038> of your servants <WH5650> to be food <WH3978> for the birds <WH5775> of the sky, <WH8064> the flesh <WH1320> of your saints <WH2623> to the animals <WH2416> of the earth. <WH776>
Their blood <WH1818> they have shed <WH8210> like water <WH4325> around <WH5439> Jerusalem. <WH3389> There was no one to bury them. <WH6912>
We have become a reproach <WH2781> to our neighbors, <WH7934> a scoffing <WH3933> and derision <WH7047> to those who are around us. <WH5439>
How long, <WH3068> Yahweh? Will you be angry <WH599> forever? <WH5331> Will your jealousy <WH7068> burn <WH1197> like fire? <WH784>
Pour out <WH8210> your wrath <WH2534> on the nations <WH1471> that don't <WH3045> know you; <WH4467> on the kingdoms that don't <WH7121> call on your name; <WH8034>
For they have devoured <WH398> Jacob, <WH3290> and destroyed <WH8074> his homeland. <WH5116>

Don't <WH2142> hold the iniquities <WH5771> of our forefathers <WH7223> against us. <WH7356> Let your tender mercies speedily <WH4118> meet <WH6923> us, <WH1809> for we are in desperate <WH3966> need. <WH1809>

Help <WH5826> us, <WH430> God of our salvation, <WH3468> for <WH1697> the glory <WH3519> of your name. <WH8034> Deliver <WH5337> us, <WH3722> and forgive our sins, <WH2403> for your name <WH8034>'s sake.

Why should the nations <WH1471> say, <WH559> "Where is their God? <WH430>" Let it be known <WH3045> among the nations, <WH1471> before our eyes, <WH5869> that vengeance <WH5360> for your servants <WH5650>' blood <WH1818> is being poured out. <WH8210>

Let the sighing <WH603> of the prisoner <WH615> come <WH935> before <WH6440> you. <WH1433> According to the greatness of your power, <WH2220> preserve <WH3498> those who are sentenced <WH1121> to death. <WH8546>
Pay back <WH7725> to our neighbors <WH7934> seven <WH7659> times into their bosom <WH2436> their reproach <WH2781> with which they have reproached <WH2778> you, <WH136> Lord.

So we, <WH5971> your people and sheep <WH6629> of your pasture, <WH4830> will give you thanks <WH3034> forever. <WH5769> We will praise <WH8416> you forever, <WH5769> to all <WH1755> generations. <WH1755>
